column6: "EVOLUTION," PART 6.   It's time for the final round in Wolverine's decades-long grudge match with Sabretooth -- and this time only one of them is walking away.  Get ready for one of the most eye-popping endings in Marvel history, True Believer!
column8: | penciller (cover):Simone Bianchi | writer:Jeph Loeb | colorist:Simone Peruzzi | letterer:Richard Starkings
